properties.name: application.jobscheduler.initialDelay
properties.description: Initial delay in milliseconds until jobscheduler starts scanning job table and executing jobs. Default: 10000

properties.name: application.jobscheduler.runinterval
properties.description: Interval in milliseconds for scanning job table for next due run. Default: 20000

properties.name: application.jobexecutor.corepoolsize
properties.description: Minimum number of threads kept alive in the thread execution pool. Default: 1

properties.name: application.jobexecutor.maxpoolsize
properties.description: Max number of threads in the thread execution pool. Default: 4
